main event: An unidentified object was observed traveling straight in Rutland, Vermont on January 20, 1959.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 3 minutes., The object was reported by a civilian housewife, who estimated the reliability of her observation as fair., The object was described as round, large, and silver in color., The sighting was classified as a visual observation confirmed by ground radar., The object was reported to be traveling east to west, circling during the observation.
witness description: a civilian housewife with a fair reliability rating
